title: 81x18: Accepting Benefits from a Former Private Employer when Leaving to Work for the Federal Government
summary: OGE advised a company that it might afford one of its employees, who was leaving the company to accept an appointment in the Federal Government, the opportunity to use its home buying service. The service did not fall within the exemptions of 18 U.S.C. § 209(b) but OGE found that the offer was made as a recognition of past services.
